entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 1:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: W 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the water this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Clearing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the water this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
